meaning: Cool white skin / Pale porcelain skin
description: Refers to skin that has low pigment, high transparency, and looks specifically pale, sometimes even looking unhealthy. It belongs to the cool tone spectrum rather than warm tone among fair skin types.

examples.chinese: 女生为了白有多努力,想爆改冷白皮还想要好气色
examples.translation: How hard girls try to be white, wanting to transform into cool white skin and also have good complexion.

examples.chinese: 我喜欢身量苗条,一头漆黑长发,冷白皮
examples.translation: I like someone slender, with jet-black long hair, and cool white skin.

examples.chinese: 出镜脸,而且给自己p脸p多了（我本人不是冷白皮）
examples.translation: Photogenic face, and Photoshopped the face too much (I am personally not cool white skinned).
